name: part_007
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Usada Pekora perform the song 'PUPPY LOVE!!' on a stage with a field-like setting.
MC section where Flare and Pekora talk about their performance and outfits. Pekora congratulates Flare on her birthday before leaving.
Flare reflects on the duet and prepares the audience for the next guest.
Shiranui Flare and Nakiri Ayame perform the song 'Okawari' in a starry sky setting.

subtitles.original: ...パピラ
subtitles.english: ...Papira.

subtitles.original: わけわかんない わけわかんない
subtitles.english: I don't understand, I don't understand.

subtitles.original: もちろん 自分のこの気持ち
subtitles.english: Of course, these feelings of mine

subtitles.original: 理解不能だよ
subtitles.english: are beyond comprehension.

subtitles.original: こいしちゃ こいしちゃ こいしちゃ
subtitles.english: Falling in love, falling in love, falling in love.

subtitles.original: やっぱり やっぱり 変かしら
subtitles.english: Is it really, really strange?

subtitles.original: ねぇ 誰か教えて
subtitles.english: Hey, someone tell me.

subtitles.original: 55万 回答 なんか教科書 どこにも載ってないし
subtitles.english: 550,000 answers, but it's not in any textbook,

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちは初めてだから
subtitles.english: because these feelings are a first for me.

subtitles.original: ああ そういえばいつか
subtitles.english: Ah, come to think of it, someday

subtitles.original: 凹んだとき
subtitles.english: when I was feeling down,

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 大丈夫
subtitles.english: it's okay, it's okay,

subtitles.original: なんとかなるよって
subtitles.english: you said it'll work out somehow,

subtitles.original: 手を握ってくれた
subtitles.english: and held my hand.

subtitles.original: わけわかんない わけわかんない
subtitles.english: I don't understand, I don't understand.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 告白するなんて
subtitles.english: Hey, to confess my love

subtitles.original: 突然すぎだよ
subtitles.english: is too sudden.

subtitles.original: なぜ どうして 私の胸
subtitles.english: Why, oh why, is my heart

subtitles.original: 破裂しそうなの
subtitles.english: about to burst?

subtitles.original: なぜか 私も好きと言ったの おかしいかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if it's weird that I said I like you too.

subtitles.original: メガキャラ キャラ キャダ キャダ キャダ
subtitles.english: Megachara chara kyada kyada kyada!

subtitles.original: チョキンチョ ハツドジョ
subtitles.english: Chokincho hatsudojo!

subtitles.original: わらわらいて パピラ
subtitles.english: Warawaraite Papira!

subtitles.original: チョキンチョ ハツドジョ
subtitles.english: Chokincho hatsudojo!

subtitles.original: パピ パピ パピ パピ パピラ
subtitles.english: Papi papi papi papi Papira!

subtitles.original: （笑い声と歓声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter and cheering)

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 最後の最後で！
subtitles.english: At the very end!

subtitles.original: 近かったね、近すぎた！
subtitles.english: We were close, too close!

subtitles.original: 支え合っちゃったけど！
subtitles.english: We ended up supporting each other!

subtitles.original: 支え合っちゃったけど、でも、これフレアが支えてもらえるかもと思ったけど
subtitles.english: We did, though I thought maybe I'd be the one Flare would support...

subtitles.original: 今日何テイク目かわかんないんですけど
subtitles.english: I don't know how many takes we've done today...

subtitles.original: もういいじゃんいいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh well, it's fine, it's fine!

subtitles.original: いや、それよりもフレア、お誕生日おめぺこー！
subtitles.english: Anyway, more importantly, Flare, happy birthday-peko!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます、本当に。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, really.

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌えてすごい嬉しかったぺこですよ、二人ってなかなかないぺこね。
subtitles.english: I was so happy we could sing together-peko. We don't get to do duos very often-peko.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよね、今回本当初めて…
subtitles.english: That's true. This time was really the first...

subtitles.original: ってか、この衣装で、一緒にちゃんと歌うの初めてじゃない？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't this the first time we've actually sung together in these outfits?

subtitles.original: しかもさ、ぺこらとフレアの衣装、なんかシナジーあるぺよね。
subtitles.english: And besides, Pekora's and Flare's outfits have a kind of synergy-peko.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよね、青と白って感じでね。
subtitles.english: Right? With the blue and white.

subtitles.original: いい感じぺこじゃん！
subtitles.english: It looks great-peko!

subtitles.original: ぴょんぴょんぴょん！
subtitles.english: Pyon pyon pyon!

subtitles.original: 激しすぎてさ、全然間奏中に喋る余裕なかったんだけど。
subtitles.english: It was so intense, I didn't have any room to talk during the instrumental breaks at all.

subtitles.original: 動きがね。
subtitles.english: The movements, yeah.

subtitles.original: 反対側もちょっとみんなと一緒にさ。
subtitles.english: Let's go to the other side with everyone too.

subtitles.original: 動きに集中しすぎて声がなんか出せなかった。
subtitles.english: I focused so much on moving that my voice didn't really come out.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！
subtitles.english: Yaho!

subtitles.original: 本当に来てくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming.

subtitles.original: ありがとぺこ！
subtitles.english: Thanks-peko!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌いたかったんだけど、由香里さんの曲をぺこらと一緒に歌ったら絶対可愛いんじゃないかって思ってたの。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to sing together, and I thought if I sang Yukari-san's song with Pekora, it would definitely be cute.

subtitles.original: 本当ぺこですか？すごい可愛いってぺこですね、これね。
subtitles.english: Really-peko? It's super cute-peko, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌えてよかった。
subtitles.english: I'm glad we could sing together.

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとうぺこだよ。まだまだあるもんね。
subtitles.english: Thank you too-peko. There's still more to come, right?

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ、まだまだコラボとかもあったり、私の曲とかもあったりするので。
subtitles.english: That's right. There are still more collaborations and some of my songs too.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってぺこな、ぺこら見守ってるからね。
subtitles.english: Do your best-peko, Pekora will be watching.

subtitles.original: ありがとね、ぺこちゃん。
subtitles.english: Thanks, Peko-chan.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね、フレア！またね！
subtitles.english: Good luck, Flare! See ya!

subtitles.original: またね！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: See ya! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: ぺこちゃんと歌えて、素敵な誕生日を迎えられたな。まだまだ続くんですけどね。
subtitles.english: Singing with Peko-chan made this a wonderful birthday. But it's not over yet.

subtitles.original: 次は誰が来てくれるんでしょうか。
subtitles.english: I wonder who's coming next.

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original:
おかわり
作詞・作曲：渡辺翔
subtitles.english:
Okawari
Lyrics/Composition: Sho Watanabe

subtitles.original: どんなに どんなに 手を取り合っていても
subtitles.english: No matter how much, no matter how much we hold hands,

subtitles.original: 最後から 最後まで 始まりはない
subtitles.english: from the very beginning to the very end, there is no start.

subtitles.original: 繊細で 臆病な やわらかな心
subtitles.english: A delicate, cowardly, soft heart,

subtitles.original: 崩さないよう 守ろう
subtitles.english: let's protect it so it doesn't crumble.

subtitles.original: 希望の中で 迷子の欠片
subtitles.english: A fragment of a lost child amidst hope,

subtitles.original: もう あの日と 違っても
subtitles.english: even if it's different from that day now,

subtitles.original: 受け入れるよ
subtitles.english: I'll accept it.

subtitles.original: どうして 欲しくて あげたくなくて
subtitles.english: Why do I want it, yet don't want to give it away?

subtitles.original: いつだって いつだって 優しくなれない
subtitles.english: I can never, ever be kind.

subtitles.original: 繰り返して 向き合った
subtitles.english: Over and over again, I faced

subtitles.original: 嘘つきな世界
subtitles.english: this lying world.

subtitles.original: 怖がってた 今までの…
subtitles.english: What I've been afraid of until now...
